Record.ClassificationPath: Digestive System Diseases/Biliary Tract Diseases/Bile Duct Diseases/Common Bile Duct Diseases/Biliary Dyskinesia/Sphincter of Oddi Dysfunction
Record.Description: Organic or functional motility disorder involving the SPHINCTER OF ODDI and associated with biliary COLIC. Pathological changes are most often seen in the COMMON BILE DUCT sphincter, and less commonly the PANCREATIC DUCT sphincter.
